title: `ReadingOrderTraversalPolicy`
subtitle: Why the basic solution fails on complex UIs.

leftBullets.title: How It Works
leftBullets.description: It sorts focusable widgets based on their paint order, which usually means top-to-bottom, left-to-right.

leftBullets.title: Where It Shines
leftBullets.description: Perfect for simple, linear layouts like vertical lists.

leftBullets.title: Where It Fails
leftBullets.description: On complex 2D layout creates a chaotic experience.

leftBullets.title: The Motivation
leftBullets.description: This failure is the primary reason we need to create our own custom traversal policies for TV applications.
